short_summary: Public Health Agency of Canada requires a new automatic microbiological media preparator to meet operational requirements.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. ...
full_summary: ### Tender Invitation |[English](#english)|[Français](#français)| | :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------| :--------------------------------------------------------------------------------| ### English: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) invites proposals for the delivery of an Automatic Microbiological Media Preparator to meet operational requirements. #### Contract Details * Reference Number: WS4408639248 * Solicitation Number: WS4408639248 * Tender Closing Date: April 5th, 2024 at 14:00 (EDT) * Contract Start Date: April 1st, 2024 * Contract End Date: March 31st, 2026 #### Service Details The service requirement is for the delivery of a new Automatic Microbiological Media Preparator. * UNSPSC Code: 41100000 - Laboratory and scientific equipment * Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD) * Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding * Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) #### Evaluation Criteria Bidders will be evaluated based on the lowest price. #### Important Dates * Tender Closing Date: April 5th, 2024 at 14:00 (EDT) * Contract Start Date: April 1st, 2024 #### Contact Information For more information or to obtain documents, please contact: Melanie Perrin Contact Information: melanie.perrin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca ### Français: Verbalisé du contact: ||||Le Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC), au nom de l'Agence de la santé publique du Canada (ASPC), invite des propositions pour la livraison d'un préparateur automatique de milieux microbiologiques pour répondre à ses besoins opérationnels. #### Détails du contrat * Numéro de référence: WS4408639248 * Numéro de sollicitation: WS4408639248 * Date de clôture de l'appel d'offres: 5 avril 2024 à 14h (HAE) * Date de début du contrat: 1er avril 2024 * Date de fin du contrat: 31 mars 202
